TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SessionEndingEventHandler(object sender, SessionEndingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SessionEndingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SessionEndingEventHandler(sender As Object, e As SessionEndingEventArgs)
public delegate void SessionEndingEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, SessionEndingEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: sender
param.span: 當 類別引發這個事件時，這個物件永遠都是 。

span.span: When this event is raised by the class, this object is always .
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理來自作業系統的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event from the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要將事件與事件處理方法產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。To associate the event with your event-handling method, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理方法。The event-handling method is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
